Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord saw Clash attack and the hawk doubted, he had given his 
honor word to protect Nighlight but his friend was in danger; 
Aerotaur could defend himself but Clash was dangerous, more dangerous 
than others bots that Windlord had met. 

Windlord looked where Nightlight was, she was starting to react, she 
slowly started to move.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Clash's other hologram disappears and the real Clash flies over the 
shot.
> 
> Clash: You will suffer now. I won't play nice anymore.
> 
> Clash dove down towardsAerotaur but pulled away really quickly. He 
stopped
> and let blades slide from his wrists. He flew in close and 
swinging...
>

you."  He

each

what
